name: SARSRelatedCoronavirusAndMERSCoronavirusRNAQualitative
title: SARS related Coronavirus and MERS Coronavirus RNA, Qualitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative detection of targeted nucleic acids from SARS-related coronaviruses, including SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV), SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), and SARS-like coronaviruses, as well as MERS coronavirus RNA in various specimens. These tests detects but does not differentiate between the viruses.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of targeted nucleic acids from SARS-related coronaviruses, including SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV), SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), and SARS-like coronaviruses, as well as MERS coronavirus RNA in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: SARS-related coronavirus+MERS coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection

contains.display: SARS-related coronavirus+MERS coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory system specimen by NAA with probe detection
